content: little beaded bracelet by penny peberdy © materials 2 00 mm hook anchor or dmc perlé no 5 1 ball makes several bracelets 60 small beads 1 larger bead or pretty button for fastening method thread the small beads on to the yarn 1 leaving a 15cm length of yarn to sew on the bead or buttonfastening at the end make 2 chain double_crochet into first chain 2 turn work 1ch slide a bead up to the wrong side of the work and holding it there firmly make 1dc into the last double_crochet repeat row 2 until all the beads are used up make 10ch tightly and slipstitch back into the last double_crochet worked end off the yarn cut and sew in the end neatly making up thread the button or large bead on to the length of yarn left at the beginning sew the end to the bracelet and fasten_off securely
